author: Denis MacShane, Denis MacShane
title: China needs to face a full reckoning for its secrecy over coronavirus
description: Donald Trump is now trying to blame the World Health Organisation for the spread of Covid-19. This is unfair when he and other Western leaders have kow-towed to the secrecy of Beijing
content:
Has the time finally come for China to come clean on its responsibility for the global spread of the Covid-19 pandemic?
In an unprecedented breach of normal diplomatic protocol, the Chinese foreign ministry has published a private conversation between the Ch… [+5472 chars]
